title: Melissa Lucio's execution: Why her supporters say she is innocent - NPR
content:
1. Melissa Lucio's execution: Why her supporters say she is innocent  NPR
  2. Republicans And Democrats Join Efforts To Stop Execution Of Melissa Lucio  NBC News
  3. In Polarized Texas, Rare Agreement: Hispanic Mother, Melissa Lucio, Should Not Be Executed  The New York Times
  4. 'We couldn't carry this alone': Melissa Lucio's family relying on faith as they wait for decision  KHOU 11
  5. Son of Harlingen woman on death row visits her before her execution  KRGV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Lucio is scheduled to be executed for the death of her 2-year-old daughter. Her supporters say she was forced into a false "confession" and that new evidence exists that proves her innocence.
